The queen buzzed in the air, floating as she looked carefully at
Talon, Straightshot and Tuscon for a long moment before she laughed!
"You have nothing to offer me that I cannot take for myself. I have no
fear of you Cybertronians." Her words cold and arrogant, dripping with
scorn.

She turned to look at small pod that housed Rodimus, her humor still
evident. With a quick slash of one of her bladed forelegs she cut
through part of the webbed adhesive that was holding the pod in place
and the pod began to sink toward the ground.

"Take him!" she said derisively, "He has already given me all that I
need to know." She floated higher into the air as she looked at the
group, the beat of her wings causing a cool breeze to stir around the
chamber.

"For it seems we have others to take his place." The queen's voice was
almost hungry as she spoke. Meanwhile, from the same direction that
Tuscon and his group had entered insectile soldiers entered, evidently
the last ones they had encountered from the bruises and dents on a
few. This time they were carrying what appeared to Scourge at first,
or at least two of him, although they were slightly lighter in color -
They were Sweeps, the drone minions of the implacable hunter!

She laughs, "My children will feed well, and learn still more."

From a few of the hundreds of dark openings a few insect like
creatures came out. These looked somewhat different than the ones the
group has seen before. Looking like a cross between a spider and a
mantis, they had scorpion no tail cannon like the others, instead they
had positioned on their bodies cannon mounts and rocket launchers,
although they did have the same mantis legs and blades. However the
most striking features was their color. Instead of the darker colors
the others have been, these were yellow and orange and red - Rodimus'
colors!

"Go my would be guardians." the queen said mockingly, "Leave now
before my children grow too hungry too soon!" More children began to
be seen coming from the caves as she spoke, although for the moment
none of them were approaching the group, but were instead lifting
their heads upwards as if sniffing the air.

(TAG)

Preston
